layer.name: Sacrifice
layer.definition: Pour out for others with no expectation of return.

questions.text: I freely share knowledge and expertise that I could charge for — I teach, mentor, and help without expecting payment.
I create content, resources, or materials that benefit others without requiring anything in return.
I invest serious intellectual effort in helping people solve their problems — not just quick advice, but real engagement.
questions.principle: Deep help costs time and thought

questions.text: I teach and train others even though they may eventually surpass me or compete with me — I'm not threatened by their growth.
I have given significant intellectual help to people who never thanked me, followed through, or succeeded — and I don't regret it.
